mapper.sql: create table if not exists plan ( `id` int primary key auto_increment, `name` varchar(30), `cost` decimal(11,3), `callMinutes` int, `sms` int, `localData` float, `domesticData` float );
create table if not exists userplansubscription ( `transactionId` int primary key, `userId` int, `planId` int, `activateTime` datetime, `orderTime` datetime, `deactivateTime` datetime );

create table if not exists userplantransaction ( `transactionId` int primary key auto_increment, `userId` int, `planId` int, `time` datetime, `action` enum('ORDER_IMMEDIATELY', 'ORDER_NEXT_MONTH', 'CANCEL_IMMEDIATELY', 'CANCEL_NEXT_MONTH') );
create table if not exists basiccost ( `id` int primary key auto_increment, `callCost` decimal(11, 3), `smsCost` decimal(11, 3), `localDataCost` decimal(11, 3), `domesticDataCost` decimal(11, 3) );
mapper.insert: insert into plan(name, cost, callMinutes, sms, localData, domesticData) VALUE (#{name}, #{cost}, #{callMinutes}, #{sms}, #{localData}, #{domesticData});
insert into basiccost(callCost, smsCost, localDataCost, domesticDataCost) VALUES (#{callCost}, #{smsCost}, #{localDataCost}, #{domesticDataCost});
insert into user(name, basicCostId, phoneNumber) VALUES (#{name}, #{basicCostId}, #{phoneNumber});
mapper.delete: drop table if exists plan, user, userplansubscription, userplantransaction, `usage`, basiccost;
